events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on keywords in their initial message.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah Miller for further assistance with the refund request.
Hello! Iâ€™m Sarah, here to help you with your refund for the wrong item you received. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed, can you please send us photos of the item you received along with the original packaging?
Sure, my order number is ORD1234567 and I have attached the photos showing the incorrect product and packaging.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide instructions to return the wrong item.
I appreciate your quick response and the refund process. Looking forward to the return instructions.
Your refund has been processed and return instructions sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to make sure you received the refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case as resolved. Please feel free to contact us anytime if further help is needed.
